epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a user, I want multi-factor authentication, so that my account is protected with an additional layer of security.
attributes_and_rules: The system must support biometric and OTP authentication for enhanced security.
acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to set up multi-factor authentication using either biometric or OTP methods. The system should prompt for the second factor during login.
test_cases: Given a user who has set up multi-factor authentication, When the user attempts to log in, Then the system should prompt for the second authentication factor.

epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
title: Enforce Role-Based Access Controls
description: As an administrator, I want to enforce role-based access controls, so that users can only access authorized services and features.
attributes_and_rules: The system must integrate with existing identity management tools to enforce these controls.
acceptance_criteria: Access to services and features should be granted based on the user's assigned role.
test_cases: Given an administrator has assigned roles to users, When a user logs in, Then the user should only see and access functionalities authorized for their role.

epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
title: Implement Password Management Policies
description: As a user, I want robust password management policies, so that my account is secure.
attributes_and_rules: Users must be able to update their passwords periodically and follow complexity rules.
acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to change their passwords and the new password should meet complexity requirements.
test_cases: Given a user with an account, When the user changes their password, Then the new password should comply with the defined complexity rules.

epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
title: Implement Session Timeout Policies
description: As an administrator, I want to enforce session timeout policies, so that inactive sessions are securely terminated.
attributes_and_rules: The system must automatically log out users after a period of inactivity.
acceptance_criteria: Sessions should automatically expire after a defined period of inactivity.
test_cases: Given a user is logged in, When the user is inactive for the configured timeout period, Then the session should be automatically terminated.

title: Create a Personalized Dashboard
description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see relevant information based on my banking profile.
attributes_and_rules: The dashboard must dynamically present relevant information such as available products, transaction summaries, and service eligibility.
acceptance_criteria: The dashboard should display information that is personalized to each customer's profile.
test_cases: Given a customer with a specific banking profile, When the customer logs into the dashboard, Then the displayed information should be relevant to their profile.

title: Ensure Responsive Dashboard Layout
description: As a customer, I want a responsive dashboard layout, so that I can access it seamlessly across multiple devices.
attributes_and_rules: The dashboard must adapt seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile interfaces.
acceptance_criteria: The dashboard should be accessible and visually consistent across different devices.
test_cases: Given a customer accessing the dashboard on different devices, When the customer views the dashboard, Then it should render correctly regardless of the device.

title: Integrate Widgets and Shortcuts
description: As a customer, I want widgets and shortcuts on my dashboard, so that I can quickly access commonly used services.
attributes_and_rules: Include widgets, shortcuts, and quick links for improved user efficiency.
acceptance_criteria: The dashboard should feature widgets and shortcuts for easy access to frequent services.
test_cases: Given a customer with a personalized dashboard, When the customer views the dashboard, Then they should see widgets and shortcuts to commonly used services.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Enable Digital Account Opening
description: As a customer, I want to open new accounts digitally, so that I can manage my banking needs online.
attributes_and_rules: The workflow must include clear progress indicators and data validation steps.
acceptance_criteria: Customers should be able to open new accounts through a guided online workflow.
test_cases: Given a customer using the portal, When the customer initiates an account opening workflow, Then they should be able to complete the process digitally with clear progress indicators.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Enable Service Modifications
description: As a customer, I want to modify existing services online, so that I can manage my services more efficiently.
attributes_and_rules: Allow functionality for uploading necessary documents and saving incomplete applications.
acceptance_criteria: Customers should be able to modify their existing services through a guided online workflow.
test_cases: Given a customer using the portal, When the customer initiates a service modification workflow, Then they should be able to complete the process digitally.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Handle Incomplete Applications
description: As a customer, I want to save incomplete applications, so that I can finish them later without starting over.
attributes_and_rules: The workflow should allow saving incomplete applications and maintaining draft states.
acceptance_criteria: Customers should be able to save and resume incomplete applications at a later time.
test_cases: Given a customer using the portal, When the customer saves an incomplete application, Then they should be able to resume it later without losing progress.

title: Implement Real-Time Status Updates
description: As a customer, I want real-time updates on my requests, so that I can track the progress of my account opening and service modifications.
attributes_and_rules: Include a request tracking feature to view real-time progress.
acceptance_criteria: Customers should receive real-time updates on their request status changes.
test_cases: Given a customer with ongoing requests, When the status of a request changes, Then the customer should receive an update in real-time.

title: Send Automated Notifications
description: As a customer, I want automated notifications on request status changes, so that I stay informed about the progress.
attributes_and_rules: Send notifications via in-portal, email, and SMS. Allow administrators to configure templates and frequency.
acceptance_criteria: Customers should automatically receive notifications on status changes via multiple channels.
test_cases: Given a customer with ongoing requests, When the status of a request changes, Then the system should send notifications via in-portal, email, and SMS.

epic_title: Interaction History and Audit Trail Management
title: Maintain Interaction History
description: As a customer, I want to access my interaction history, so that I can review my past actions and request statuses.
attributes_and_rules: Users should have access to a personal history view.
acceptance_criteria: Customers should be able to access a detailed history of their interactions and requests.
test_cases: Given a customer with past interactions, When the customer views their history, Then they should see a detailed list of their previous actions and request statuses.

epic_title: Interaction History and Audit Trail Management
title: Implement Audit Logging
description: As an administrator, I want detailed logs of all system activities, so that I can ensure compliance and perform audits.
attributes_and_rules: Maintain detailed immutable logs for compliance and reporting.
acceptance_criteria: Administrators should have access to immutable logs of all system activities.
test_cases: Given an administrator needing to perform an audit, When the administrator views the logs, Then they should see detailed and unalterable records of all system activities.

epic_title: Core Banking System Integration and Database Optimization
title: Integrate Portal with Core Banking System
description: As a system, I want real-time integration with the core banking system, so that data is synchronized for seamless operations.
attributes_and_rules: Establish real-time synchronization for customer, product, and transaction data.
acceptance_criteria: The portal should synchronize data in real-time with the core banking system.
test_cases: Given the portal and core banking system, When data is updated on either side, Then changes should instantly reflect on the other side.

epic_title: Core Banking System Integration and Database Optimization
title: Optimize Database for Performance
description: As a system, I want an optimized database, so that portal operations are efficient and don't overload the core system.
attributes_and_rules: Implement caching, load balancing, and service queues.
acceptance_criteria: The portal database should handle high loads efficiently without affecting core system performance.
test_cases: Given the optimized portal database, When there are high loads, Then the system should maintain performance without overloading.

title: Design a Fully Responsive Interface
description: As a customer, I want a fully responsive interface, so that I can use the portal seamlessly on any device.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure compatibility with desktops, tablets, and mobile phones.
acceptance_criteria: The portal interface should provide a consistent experience across all devices.
test_cases: Given customers using different devices, When they access the portal, Then the interface should adapt to their device seamlessly.

title: Ensure Accessibility Compliance
description: As a user with disabilities, I want an accessible portal, so that I can navigate it easily.
acceptance_criteria: The portal should be compliant with established accessibility guidelines.
test_cases: Given a user with disabilities, When they use the portal, Then they should be able to navigate it without barriers.
